price: Apabila sangkakala ditiup, maka tidaklah ada lagi pertalian nasab di antara mereka pada hari itu 1024 dan tidak ada pula mereka saling bertanya.
arabic: فَإِذَا نُفِخَ فِي ٱلصُّورِ فَلَآ أَنسَابَ بَيۡنَهُمۡ يَوۡمَئِذٖ وَلَا يَتَسَآءَلُونَ
footnotes: 1024.  Maksudnya, pada hari kiamat itu, manusia tidak dapat tolong-menolong, walaupun dalam kalangan sekeluarga.

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: fa-idhā nufikha fī al-ṣūri falā ansāba baynahum yawma-idhin walā yatasāalūna
